Requirements Your target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Doomed]{Doomed 2} or greater.

You finish your target with a vicious attack. Make a Strike against the target. If you hit, the target takes 4d6 extra precision damage with a @Check[fortitude|against:class|basic] save against your class DC. If the target critically fails, they die. This is an incapacitation effect. The creature then becomes temporarily immune to your Slay for 1 day.
